ca.ualberta.cmput301w15t13.Fragments

Class ClaimManagerFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • ca.ualberta.cmput301w15t13.Fragments.ClaimManagerFragment

  • public class ClaimManagerFragment
extends Fragment
    This fragment is used for creating and editing claims. Both functions use the same layout, so it's more familiar to the user. When creating, all fields are empty, and when editing, they're populated by existing data. Outstanding Issues: Change the back button to change fragments, not activities.

      • openDateDialog

        public void openDateDialog(TextView textId)
        Opens a new date picker dialog to set the start and end dates of a claim. It will parse the date selected and update the corresponding text view, passed as textId
        Parameters:
        textId -

      • createClaim

        public boolean createClaim()
                    throws InvalidDateException,
                           InvalidUserPermissionException,
                           EmptyFieldException
        Creates a new claim based on the fields that have been updated by updateReferences. Then adds it to the CLaimlist and updates the ArrayAdapter. Returns true only when a claim has been created
        Returns:
        valid claim created
        Throws:
        InvalidDateException
        InvalidNameException
        InvalidUserPermissionException
        EmptyFieldException
